name: Before Insert Date and Time Modification
script:
creation_str = str(doc.creation)

doc.created_on_date = creation_str[:10] 
doc.created_on_time = creation_str[11:19]

name: Before Save Date and Time Modification
script:
modified_str = str(doc.modified)
doc.custom_last_modified_date = modified_str[:10]
doc.custom_last_modified_time = modified_str[11:19]

name: ISIPL HD Ticket Customization
